questions: How long will the cruise take?
You are 8 years old, how much will you pay?
article:
Hong Kong Harbor Night Cruise  
Enjoy the delicious dinner on the ferry 
and watch the beautiful city lights
Time : 6:30 p.m.- 9:30 p.m.
Price : Adults : HK$ 180    Children under 12 : HK$ 100
Start / Finish : Kowloon Public Pier  
Tel : (852) 2853 3888
E - mail:enquiry@chinatravel1.co
